resources.string: Waiting for device(sender) to receive data from…
The file and data sharing feature will not work without location. To change this, go to Settings > Location
Searching for a device(recipient) to send data to…
Scan the QR Code on the receiving device, \"%s\'s device\", to confirm the correct device
You are now connected to the receiver %s
You are now connected to the sender %s
An error occurred before the connection could be accepted or rejected
Do you want to accept connection to %s?
Confirm the code [%s] matches on both devices before you accept the connection
Advertising could not be started - FAILED
Authentication failed! The connection has been rejected
An error occurred and we cannot start receiving
An error occurred and we cannot start sending
Connection to %s could not be authorized
Discovery could not be started - FAILED
Connection initiated by : %1$s Endpoint name(%2$s) auth code(%3$s)
Rejecting connection initiated by the other device %1$s, %2$s, %3$s
COULD NOT INITIATE CONNECTION REQUEST TO THE DEVICE
Authentication successful! Receiver can accept connection
Detector dependencies are not yet available.
Barcode detector dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Could not show Google Play Services resolution dialog since it was not called from an activity
Do not have permission to start the camera
Scan this QR Code using the sending device, \"%s\'s device\", to confirm the correct device
An error occurred trying to get your WiFi Mac address
Getting device mac address was not successful! It failed
An error occurred trying to delete the P2P received history of the device %s
An error occurred trying to save the new sender details
Hash key was sent in an invalid format
Authorization details sent by receiver are invalid
Authorization details sent by receiver are invalid
Hash key was sent was null
A JSONParseException occurred trying to process received history
An error occurred trying to process non-media data
An error occurred trying to process non-media data
Ignoring payload %1$d since it does not match the expected payload %2$d
Received a payload without a corresponding manifest
onConnectionRejected was called for endpoint %s and no peer device is connected
onConnectionUnknownError for endpoint %s was called and no peer device is connected
onConnectionBroken was called for endpoint %s and no peer device is connected
onDisconnected was called for endpoint %s and no peer device is connected
Could not stop sending data because no endpoint exists
onConnectionAccepted to endpoint %s without a peer device
onConnectionUnknownError to endpoint %s without a peer device
Please make sure \"%1$s\'s device\" is turned on and in range. %2$s records were transferred. Reconnect to transfer the remaining data.
The receiving device, \"%s\'s device\", chose to skip the QR scan step. Choosing skip will let you send data to the other device without a QR scan confirmation.
The sending device, \"%s\'s device\", chose to skip the QR scan step. Choosing skip will let the data be transferred to your device without a QR scan confirmation.
Authentication tokens do not match. You are connecting to the wrong device
Please make sure \"%s\'s device\" is turned on and in range
Discovering timed out and interactor was not in discovering mode
Advertising timed out and interactor was not in advertising mode
Please make sure the device you want to send data to is turned on and in range
Please make sure the devices remain within range during data transfer
Google play services in required for this service to work
You need to update your device\'s google play service
Please turn on your device\'s WiFi hardware
